story.title: My Story
story.text1: I am a recently graduated FullStack developer, passionate about creating digital solutions that are accessible and efficient.
story.text2: Currently, I am doing an Internship at a Swiss company, where I am developing my practical skills and learning new technologies.

goals.title: Future Goals
goals.text1: My future goal is to specialize in **Data Analysis and Artificial Intelligence**, combining my development knowledge with the power of data.
goals.text2: Currently, I am learning about data analysis and AI to expand my professional capabilities.
